Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Reduces the amount a utility can be assessed for costs and expenses of the department of public service and the public service commission from one percent to one-third of one percent
Summary: Reduces the total amount that can be charged from one percent to one-third of one percent.
LawCode: Amd ยง18-a, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to reducing the amount a utility can be assessed for costs and expenses of the department of public service and the public service commission
